definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
Aegis Combat System (weapons system developed for the US Navy)
pinyin: Zhou4 si1 dun4 Zhan4 dou4 Xi4 tong3

definition: battle group/naval formation headed by an aircraft carrier
while there is life, the fight continues (idiom); to fight to the last
pinyin: sheng1 ming4 bu4 xi1 , zhan4 dou4 bu4 zhi3

definition: carrier-based vanguard group (CBVG)/naval battle group led by an aircraft carrier
pinyin: hang2 kong1 mu3 jian4 zhan4 dou4 qun2

sentences.english: Hand-in-glove with radar was battle management.
sentences.chinese: 与雷达密切相关的是战斗管理。

sentences.english: When Sin claps his broad wings over the battle.
sentences.chinese: 当罪恶煽动巨翼在战斗中肆虐。

sentences.english: There is a discrepancy in the combat log when casting Paladin healing spells.
sentences.chinese: 战斗记录当中对骑士的治疗记录有错误。

sentences.english: Might UAVs eventually replace manned combat aircraft altogether?
sentences.chinese: 那么无人机是否可能完全替代人工驾驶的战斗机？

sentences.english: I would try to maximize my combat capability, as long as this process goes on," he said.
sentences.chinese: 只要这个过程还在继续，我就会尽量加大战斗能力。

sentences.english: To Indra in the tumult of battle.
sentences.chinese: 以因陀罗在喧哗的战斗。
喷气式战斗机在空中侦察巡逻。

sentences.english: Many arrange to fight in a sitting posture.
sentences.chinese: 许多人布置好可以坐着战斗的位置。

sentences.english: The Thunderbolt gained fame as the most powerful and actively used American fighter-bomber used extensively for targeting ground installations.
sentences.chinese: 没想到雷电因此成为了美国最著名的战斗轰炸机。

sentences.english: As the enemy retreated, we were ordered to disengage.
sentences.chinese: 当敌人退却时我们受命撤出战斗。

sentences.english: Both his parents fought in it.
sentences.chinese: 他的双亲都参与了此次战斗。

sentences.english: Israel says it killed at least 20 guerillas in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 以色列说，以军在战斗中至少打死20名游击队员。

sentences.english: In the Empire, a standard Dreadnaught carried a squadron of TIE fighters.
sentences.chinese: 在帝国，一艘标准的无畏级携带一个中队的钛战斗机。

sentences.english: FXP: Fighting Experience allows you to level up.
sentences.chinese: 战斗经验可以让您级别提升。

sentences.english: The fighter also carried an astromech droid for onboard repairs.
sentences.chinese: 战斗机上也有宇航技工机器人负责机载维修。

sentences.english: This might be the reason why the Valkyries are also called the "Battle Maidens."
sentences.chinese: 这可能是女武神的原因也被称为“战斗少女。”

definition: to go to war/to engage in war
